devdoc.details: Contract allows user to invest into an ERC20 token This implementation uses the Pangolin DEX

AssetsAdded((bytes32,address)[]).details: emitted after the owner adds/updates assets

AssetsRemoved(bytes32[]).details: emitted after the owner removes assets

TokenPurchase(address,uint256,uint256,bo.details: emitted after a tokens were purchased

TokenSell(address,uint256,uint256,bool).details: emitted after a tokens were sold

buyAsset(bytes32,uint256).details: _token ERC20 token's address_exactERC20AmountOut amount of the ERC20 token to be bought*

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sellAsset(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: _token ERC20 token's address_exactERC20AmountIn amount of the ERC20 token to be sold_minAvaxAmountOut minimum amount of the AVAX token to be bought*

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: PangolinExchange

buyAsset(bytes32,uint256).notice: Buys selected ERC20 token with AVAX using the Pangolin DEX Refunds unused AVAX to the msg.sender

getAllAssets().notice: Returns all the supported assets keys*

getEstimatedAVAXForERC20Token(uint256,ad.notice: Returns the minimum AVAX amount that is required to buy _exactAmountOut of _token ERC20 token.*

getEstimatedAVAXFromERC20Token(uint256,a.notice: Returns the maximum AVAX amount that will be obtained in the event of selling _amountIn of _token ERC20 token.*

getMinimumERC20TokenAmountForExactAVAX(u.notice: Returns the minimum token amount that is required to be sold to receive _exactAmountOut of AVAX.*

sellAsset(bytes32,uint256,uint256).notice: Sells selected ERC20 token for AVAX
